thumbro-invalid-file: Could not process requested file. Check that it exists on this wiki.
thumbro-invalid-width: Thumbnail width should be larger than zero and not larger than file width.
thumbro-invalid-sharpen: Sharpening amount should be a number larger than zero and smaller than five.
thumbro-thumb-error: VIPS could not generate a thumbnail with given parameters.
thumbro-thumb-notscaled: VIPS did not scale the thumbnail.
thumbro-thumbs-help: The thumbnail shown below was generated with the default scaler. Move your mouse over the thumbnail to compare it with the one generated by VIPS. Alternatively, you can click / unclick the checkbox below to switch between thumbnails.
thumbro-thumbs-switch-label: Click to switch between default and VIPS scaling output.
action-thumbro-test: use the VIPS scaling test interface [[Special:ThumbroTest]]
right-thumbro-test: Use the VIPS scaling test interface [[Special:ThumbroTest]]
